duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide end-user technical support including general maintenance tasks, troubleshooting, and repairing computer systems and peripheral equipment.
Serve as a primary and secondary point of contact for end user support requests and actively troubleshoot and resolve escalated end-user requests within established IT guidelines.
Provisioning and revoking account access to technology systems, including cloud-based systems and business applications.
Collaborate with infrastructure engineering team for problem resolution and new projects/initiatives.
Manage and coordinate hardware deployments and disposals, and work with 3rd party vendors for hardware and software procurement.

education_certification.credential: High school/GED with at least 2 years of experience in hardware and software support
